question.text:
Match the interhalogen compounds of column-I with the geometry in column-II and assign the correct code.
Column-I Column-II
(1) XX' (i) T-shape
(2) XX'3 (ii) Pentagonal bipyramidal
(3) XX'5 (iii) Linear
(4) XX'7 (iv) Square-pyramidal
  (v) Tetrahedral

solution.text:
XX' XX'3 XX'5 XX'7
sp3 sp3d sp3d2 sp3d3
Linear T-shape Square-pyramidal Pentagonal bipyramidal
